lines.text: If an animal can act like a man, why not a man like an animal?
Kimba, we'd like for you to stay with us until you feel strong enough to go home.
Kimba thanks kind lady with golden hair.
Leopards did not kill this man. Leopards never kill with claws alone. Use teeth!
And the man that interfered his fate too shall be death. Right before he dies, he shall see his woman and his boy slain.
